DOC.brief_summary: The `` All-inside '' method new minimally invasive procedure anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction ( ACL ) . It consist incomplete bone tunnel drill cortical fixation . In so-called `` classical '' method , fixation achieve interference screw . The hypothesis study `` All-inside '' technique cause less pain conventional technique . The main objective evaluate immediate postoperative pain first ten day one month intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Evaluation After Anterior Cruciate Ligament ( ACL ) Ligamentoplasty
DOC.criteria: Total partial tear Anterior Cruciate Ligament Patient refusal
